Name: Lucy´s World
About the game: The Dark Mage has kidnapped the magic dragons of the land. Help Lucy and her companion free the little dragons. - Survive over 100 different levels and collect magic diamonds to free the dragons. - Use your companion's abilities to reach places you wouldn't go without him. - Look for a star in each level, if you find them all, an even greater challenge awaits you.
